Text:
The Books are:

Demon - The Fallen Core
Demon the Fallen - City of Angels
Demon the Fallen - Damned & Deceived
Demon the Fallen - Earthbound
Demon the Fallen - Player's Guide
Demon the Fallen - Storyteller's Companion


Soon to get the rest of the books plus Days of Fire.

Cheers!
can someone seed the last 0.1% of this please?

Nevinryal here, Good to see there are still some who keep this going strong, also I have Trilogy of the Fallen and am going to upload it soon it's a later series based on Demon: The Fallen, good books btw hope you all enjoy. It's my own way of thanking you all for letting me get ahold of Demon:The Fallen. Thank you!
